preface.para: The goal of this document, a project of olpcSF.org, is to provide helpful documentation of the pathagar book server project and more specifically to help with installation, configuration and usage of this service software on low energy requiring hardware. We begin with the DreamPlug but hope eventually to gain and report experience with other platforms such as CuBox, TrimSlice, and perhaps others.
